title: RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (8) : invalid device function at SpatialReflectionPadding.cu
body_html:
I am trying to run pytorch using the supplied docker image. My script crashes during the forward pass with the error below.

Additional info:
nvidia-smi gives the expected result inside the container.
torch.cuda.is_available() returns true.
Nvidia driver version 375.26
Quadro M1000M 4GB Card

Thanks!

File "/opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py35/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 252, in __call__ result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs) File "/opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py35/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/container.py", line 67, in forward input = module(input) File "/opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py35/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 252, in __call__ result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs) File "/opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py35/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/padding.py", line 37, in forward return F.pad(input, self.padding, 'reflect') File "/opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py35/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/nn/functional.py", line 1038, in pad return _functions.thnn.ReflectionPad2d.apply(input, *pad) File "/opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py35/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/nn/_functions/thnn/auto.py", line 174, in forward getattr(ctx._backend, update_output.name)(ctx._backend.library_state, input, output, *args) RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (8) : invalid device function at /tmp/pip-6ngn5m9f-build/torch/lib/THCUNN/generic/SpatialReflectionPadding.cu:63
